subject: Sponsorship Proposal for the Cumbre SimRacing GT World Championship 2026
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

My name is *Santi Concepción*, and I am contacting you on behalf of *Cumbre
SimRacing*. We are pleased to introduce the *Cumbre SimRacing GT World
Championship 2026*, a global GT series featuring *€15,000 in prizes
distributed among the top 20 drivers*, across *six rounds throughout 2026*.
Based on current projections, we expect *over 600 drivers* to take part,
making it one of the most competitive and widely followed sim racing
championships of the year.

We would be delighted to count Simsonn as one of our official partners. As
part of our proposal, your brand logo would appear on *every car competing
in the championship*, ensuring consistent visibility throughout the season.
In addition, each race broadcast would begin with a *15-second Simsonn
product spotlight*, and our full social-media campaign would include *tags
and mentions* of your brand in all championship-related posts. We would
also introduce a special prize—the *Simsonn Award*—granted to the driver
achieving the most pole positions during the season.

In return for these assets, we kindly request your support in the form
of *shared
promotion*: reposting social-media activity related to the championship,
the Simsonn Award, and selected action photos or videos that we will
provide throughout the competition. This shared visibility will strengthen
the impact of both brands and maximise engagement with our respective
audiences.

Finally, we would like to request a *30% discount* on two of your products:
the *Simsonn Pedals Plus X*, awarded to the winner of the Simsonn Award;
and the *Simsonn Pedals Pro X Ultra*, awarded to the overall champion of
the GT World Championship. Cumbre SimRacing will cover the discounted
purchase cost so that both winners receive their prizes *free of charge*.

We would be glad to discuss any details further and explore how we can
build a strong collaboration for 2026. Thank you very much for your time
and consideration.

Kind regards,
*Cumbre SimRacing*

conversations.body_text: Hi Santi,  Thank you so much for reaching out, and congratulations on organizing what looks to be one of the most ambitious and exciting global championships of 2026. The scale, structure, and professionalism of the Cumbre SimRacing GT World Championship are truly impressive — and we’re very interested in being part of it.  We’re happy to support your project, and we can provide a special 30% discount on the two products intended as prizes. Your exclusive code is: Cumbre30  This code can be used to purchase the Simsonn Pedals Plus X and Simsonn Pedals Pro X Ultra at a 30% discount for award purposes.  We also appreciate the visibility you’re offering — logo placement on every car, a 15-second product spotlight on each broadcast, social-media mentions, and the creation of the Simsonn Award. In return, we’re happy to repost and share your championship content once it is published, helping amplify the reach of both your brand and ours.  Please feel free to send over any additional details, timelines, or media assets when ready. We’d be glad to continue the conversation and finalize our cooperation for the 2026 season.  Looking forward to working together!  Best regards, Simsonn Team

Hi Simsonn Team,

Thank you very much for your positive response and for providing the
*Cumbre30* discount code. We’re excited to move forward with the
partnership and begin integrating Simsonn into our promotional and
competition materials. Along with our next email, we’ll attach a simple
contract already signed on our side, including our company details, and
with a dedicated section for your signature and corresponding information.

To ensure we represent your brand and products accurately and
professionally, could you please provide us with *all available media
assets* for the two models included in our agreement — the *Simsonn Pedals
Plus X* and the *Simsonn Pedals Pro X Ultra*?
We would greatly appreciate any *photos, videos, product renders, spec
sheets, or promotional clips* you may have for these products.

Additionally, we would like to request the *Simsonn logo* in all
available *formats,
color versions, and variations* that you currently use or would prefer us
to apply across the championship. This will ensure consistent and correct
brand representation in all official assets.

Once we receive the material, we will immediately begin working on the *public
announcement*, the *initial promotional campaign*, and the *logistical
development* of your branding within our official assets — including
the *championship
car liveries*, *broadcast templates*, and other visual elements.

Thank you once again for your trust and collaboration. We’re very much
looking forward to building something great together.

Best regards,
*Santi*
Cumbre SimRacing
